name: Pirate's Island HD
description:
You are shipwrecked on the Pirate’s Island in the Caribbean Sea. Captain Barbarossa wants a rake-off from you to stay on the isle. You need to pay him every month or you’ll walk the plank of his Galleon… and you don’t like sharks!

But you only have few doubloons, so how do you get more? It’s easy: challenge buccaneers on the most famous game played on the island! Defeat your opponents and win the needed doubloons in this challenging and fun brain training game with an emphasis on fast-paced action and beautiful graphics!

Some features:
* expressly and exclusively designed for iPad;
* solo and multiplayer modes (Game Center and Bluetooth supported);
* 16 achievements, global leaderboard;
* special weapons to use in multiplayer mode: use strategy to improve your chances to win;
* voice chat support in multiplayer mode;
* beautiful graphics and sounds;
* playable for everybody and anybody!
* it's really fun for all ages! A fun way to test your grey matter!

Be careful: it’s very addicting!
